definitions.text: a measure of how likely it is that some event will occur; a number expressing the ratio of favorable cases to the whole number of cases possible
examples: the probability that an unbiased coin will fall with the head up is 0.5

definitions.text: the quality of being probable; a probable event or the most probable event
examples: for a while mutiny seemed a probability
going by past experience there was a high probability that the visitors were lost
